Articles.Content:
Hello everybody, I am planning on starting a tour as soon as Czokletmuss releases his guide on how to do a Grand Tour.

Destinations:

Unknown:

I haven't really thought this through that much so please stay with me as I figure this out.

I am playing with a few mods. I will be reposting my mods list when I get closer to starting the tour

Mods:

Alternis Kerbol do to some memory issues, I will be unable to use this mod

TDA

Edited January 12, 2014 by team.leit
Editing some information

Here are my initial designs.

Javascript is disabled. View full album

So far it is pushing over 200 parts and that is w/o all the moudles attached

Edited December 24, 2013 by team.leit

I am interested... I always wanted to do a grand tour- the Venturer Mission- ever since I saw Czo's thread; I never did, seeing someone else do it will be interesting. Of course, I specialize on my little colony on the Mun instead

Is it career or sandbox?

I am planning on doing it in career mode so that I can show the science logs like a real life space mission.

EDIT: for the sake of FPS, I am removing the clouds plugin.

EDIT2: I also added the kethane mod with some tweaks to work with TAC Lifesupport.

Edited December 25, 2013 by team.leit

I have added some more images to the planning album and I would like some help in setting up a propulsion module for the ship. If you would like to help with that or anything else planning wise, please PM me or post here with your suggestions
